result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher M. Craig was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: The costs in this matter have been paid from the Defendant's cash bond.  The balance owed to the Clerk of Court in this case is $0.
Jail is with huber for work release.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher M. Craig

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Christopher M. Craig
Current: 18337 Gillingham Drive, Richland Center, WI 53581 United States  (Effective: 01-29-2015)
Prior: 18801 STH 60, Muscoda, WI 53573 United States
RCSD Dispo of Warrant or Commitment (time served)

14CF24, 14CF51, and 14CF52.  ADA Forehand, Def in custody, and Atty. Lawrence for 14CF24 and 14CF51 and Atty. Longacre for 14CF52.  

Counsel have informed the Court that the parties have reached an agreement to resolve all three cases.

ADA Forehand details the agreement:  Def to plead to all three charges in 14CF24, to one amended count of mis. bail jumping in 14CF51, and to stalking charge in 14CF52; all other counts to be dismissed/read in.  Per Forehand, the sentencing recommendation calls for 3 years probation in 14CF24 with conditions to include costs, d.a. education, completion of parenting class, seek/maintain employment as agent deems appropriate, contact with the children as allowed by HHS, and no contact with JC.  In 14CF51, recommendation is for 6 mo jail.  In 14CF52, recommendation is for 18 mo in/2 yr ext. supervision imposed/stayed for 3 years probation.

Def pleads no contest to the counts stated.  Court's colloquy re pleas.  Finding of guilty.

Parties address Court.  Defense requests stay of jail (Atty. L makes the request).  Court denies the stay.

Sentence:  

14CF24 - 3 years probation with conditions that def attend, succ. complete, and pay for any counseling/education programs; pay costs; attend/pay for/succ. complete class on d.violence (24-26 week class); parenting class; seek employment as recommended by agent.  May have contact with children as permitted by Richland County HHS.  No contact with JC unless it is permitted by agent. 

Work release granted.

14CF51 - 6 mo county jail with huber, to begin immediately.  4 days credit.

14CF52 - 42 month Wisconsin prison system sentence with Dodge as reception center - 18 mo initial and 24 mo ext. supervision.  This imposed and stayed for probation of 3 years, concurrent with other 3 year probation term with same conditions described in 14CF24.  If revoked and on ext. supervision, he would have same conditions.

Court provides felony conviction admonishments.

DNA sample and surcharge.

D.A. enhancer to be added to the stalking count costs.
Status conference on September 17, 2014 at 02:30 pm.
Court directs clerk to set this matter for 09/17/14 status conference. Moved from 10/15/14.

ADDRESS INFO for Christopher M. Craig
Current: 18801 STH 60, Muscoda, WI 53573 United States  (Effective: 08-26-2014)
Prior: 18337 Gillingham Drive, Richland Center, WI 53581
Status conference on October 15, 2014 at 09:00 am.

ADA Forehand, Def, and Atty. Lawrence for initial in 14CF51 and status in 14CF24.  

Formal reading waived in 14CF51.  Def also waives time limits for prelim.  Status requested and set in both cases.

Atty. L states that bond was modified at the last hearing; wants it modified further; states the the def and party are presently engaged in counseling; asks that bond be amended to allow the parties to have contact for that counseling.  ADA Forehand is opposed to that request.  Court denies Atty. L's request to further modify bond.  Status conference scheduled for 10-15-2014 at 09:00 am.
